casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Paul DELAIR 30P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 23, 2019 C. Melissa Owen, Attorney at Law, Cheyenne N. Chambers, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Delair, Robert Paul Anne J. Brown, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of January 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of January 2019."
